text:
"The Black Cat" is a 1934 American psychological horror movie. It is directed by Edgar G. Ulmer. The movie is based on the short story "The Black Cat" by Edgar Allan Poe. Actors include: Boris Karloff, Bela Lugosi, Harry Cording, David Manners, Julie Bishop, and Lucille Lund. It was distributed by Universal Pictures.
This was the first movie with both Boris Karloff and Bela Lugosi.
